mc.name: Plague Witch
mc.oracleText: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {B}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "I can ail what cures you."

mc.name: Defiant Falcon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Lawbringer
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Remove target red creature from the game.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Remove target red creature from the game.
mc.flavorText:
One injustice starts a thousand riots. One law stops a thousand crimes.
--Lawbringer creed

mc.name: Lightbringer
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Remove target black creature from the game.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Remove target black creature from the game.
mc.flavorText:
One thought opens a thousand eyes. One sun brings a thousand dawns.
--Lightbringer creed

mc.name: Lashknife
mc.oracleText:
If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Lashknife's mana cost.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has first strike.
mc.printedText:
If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying Lashknife's mana cost.
Enchanted creature has first strike.
mc.flavorText: Those it won't scare, it scars.

mc.name: Angelic Favor
mc.oracleText:
If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Angelic Favor's mana cost.

Play Angelic Favor only during combat.

Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying into play. Remove it from the game at end of turn.
mc.printedText:
If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying Angelic Favor's mana cost.
Play Angelic Favor only during combat.
Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying into play. Remove it from the game at end of turn.

mc.name: Seal of Cleansing
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
--Seal inscription

mc.name: Fanatical Devotion
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.
mc.flavorText: The Oracle told Eladamri he would save his people by abandoning them. His followers adopted that ideal.

mc.name: Noble Stand
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature you control blocks, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature you control blocks, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Soldiers will always endanger their lives to defend many other lives.

mc.name: Avenger en-Dal
mc.oracleText: {2}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Remove target attacking creature from the game. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
mc.printedText: {2}{W}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Remove target attacking creature from the game. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

mc.name: Chieftain en-Dal
mc.oracleText: Whenever Chieftain en-Dal attacks, attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Chieftain en-Dal attacks, attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The clearest commands are practical examples.

mc.name: Voice of Truth
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from white
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from white
mc.flavorText:
"Above them all is Truth, and Truth must be set free. If the wings of Truth are clipped, the voices will fall silent."
--Song of All, canto 167

mc.name: Defiant Vanguard
mc.oracleText:
When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn.
{5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn.
{5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Topple
mc.oracleText: Remove target creature with the greatest power from the game. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)
mc.printedText: Remove target creature with the greatest power from the game. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target only one of them.)
mc.flavorText:
"Let all witness the fate of those who defy me."
--Crovax

mc.name: Sivvi's Ruse
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls a Mountain and you control a Plains, you may play Sivvi's Ruse without paying its mana cost.

Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent controls a mountain and you control a plains, you may play Sivvi's Ruse without paying its mana cost.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

mc.name: Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero
mc.oracleText:
{X}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
{3}: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
mc.printedText:
{X}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
{3}: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

mc.name: Blinding Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next combat phase.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next combat phase.
mc.flavorText: "Their eyes will shrivel and blacken before faith's true light."

mc.name: Spiritual Asylum
mc.oracleText:
Creatures and lands you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
When a creature you control attacks, sacrifice Spiritual Asylum.
mc.printedText:
Creatures and lands you control can't be the target of spells or abilities.
When a creature you control attacks, sacrifice Spiritual Asylum.
mc.flavorText: Trapped in safety is still trapped.

mc.name: Trickster Mage
mc.oracleText: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.printedText: {U}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.flavorText: "If it ain't broke, I'll break it. If it is broke, I'll fix it."

mc.name: Wandering Eye
mc.oracleText:
Flying

All players play with their hands revealed.
mc.printedText:
Flying
All players play with their hands revealed.
mc.flavorText: The evincar has many ways of keeping track of his subjects.

mc.name: Cloudskate
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

mc.name: Jolting Merfolk
mc.oracleText:
Fading 4 (This creature comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Jolting Merfolk: Tap target creature.
mc.printedText:
Fading 4 (This creature comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Jolting Merfolk: Tap target creature.

mc.name: Sneaky Homunculus
mc.oracleText: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
mc.printedText: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
mc.flavorText: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

mc.name: Sliptide Serpent
mc.oracleText: {3}{U}: Return Sliptide Serpent to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: {3}{U}: Return Sliptide Serpent to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: It's futile to fight something you can see only in the corner of your eye.

mc.name: Daze
mc.oracleText:
You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost.

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.printedText:
You may return an island you control to its owner's hand instead of paying Daze's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

mc.name: Accumulated Knowledge
mc.oracleText: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
mc.printedText: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of Accumulated Knowledge cards in all graveyards.
mc.flavorText:
"I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."
--Takara, to Eladamri

mc.name: Infiltrate
mc.oracleText: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
mc.flavorText: Getting in was the easy part. Getting out proved to be more difficult.

mc.name: Seal of Removal
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold."
--Seal inscription

mc.name: Mossdog
mc.oracleText: Whenever Mossdog becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Mossdog.
mc.printedText: Whenever Mossdog becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Mossdog.
mc.flavorText: The more you look at it, the more dangerous it becomes.

mc.name: Submerge
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls a Forest and you control an Island, you may play Submerge without paying its mana cost.

Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent controls a forest and you control an island, you may play Submerge without paying its mana cost.
Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

mc.name: Seahunter
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Merfolk permanent card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Merfolk card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: "They can't feel pain. They just wiggle 'cause they're scared."

mc.name: Stronghold Biologist
mc.oracleText: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target creature spell.
mc.printedText: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Counter target creature spell.
mc.flavorText: He twists the laws of nature until they scream.

mc.name: Pale Moon
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, if a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, if a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of its normal type.
mc.flavorText: Denizens of Rath had never seen the moon before. It was a symbol of change, not constancy.

mc.name: Dominate
mc.oracleText: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X or less. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X or less. (This spell's effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.flavorText:
"I've come to reclaim what is mine. And you, Greven, are mine."
--Volrath

mc.name: Rising Waters
mc.oracleText:
Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land he or she controls.
mc.printedText:
Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land he or she controls.
mc.flavorText: Rising waters, sinking hope.

mc.name: Rathi Intimidator
mc.oracleText:
Fear
{2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Rathi Intimidator can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
{2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Belbe's Percher
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Belbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Belbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: Long and powerful, these birds were used to carry messages to and from the evincar.

mc.name: Spiteful Bully
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, Spiteful Bully deals 3 damage to target creature you control.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, Spiteful Bully deals 3 damage to target creature you control.
mc.flavorText: Like most creatures bent on total destruction, they rarely bother to double-check their targets.

mc.name: Spineless Thug
mc.oracleText: Spineless Thug can't block.
mc.printedText: Spineless Thug can't block.
mc.flavorText: These troops are only as strong as the evincar's control.

mc.name: Rathi Fiend
mc.oracleText:
When Rathi Fiend comes into play, each player loses 3 life.
{3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
When Rathi Fiend comes into play, each player loses 3 life.
{3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Mind Swords
mc.oracleText:
If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Mind Swords's mana cost.

Each player removes two cards in his or her hand from the game.
mc.printedText:
If you control a swamp, you may sacrifice a creature instead of paying Mind Swords's mana cost.
Each player removes two cards in his or her hand from the game.

mc.name: Parallax Dementia
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Fading 1 (This enchantment comes into play with one fade counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2.
When Parallax Dementia leaves play, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText:
Fading 1 (This enchantment comes into play with one fade counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2.
When Parallax Dementia leaves play, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Seal of Doom
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"I am the banisher, the ill will that snuffs the final candle."
--Seal inscription

mc.name: Vicious Hunger
mc.oracleText: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature. You gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Blood is foul, the flesh dross. My ascendance thirsts for life itself."
--Crovax

mc.name: Divining Witch
mc.oracleText: {1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Name a card. Remove the top six cards of your library from the game. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card, then put that card into your hand. Remove all other cards revealed this way from the game.
mc.printedText: {1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Name a card. Remove the top six cards of your library from the game. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card, then put that card into your hand. Remove all other cards revealed this way from the game.

mc.name: Carrion Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.
mc.flavorText: A wall built from the bodies of the enemy will never lack building material in times of war.

mc.name: Battlefield Percher
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Battlefield Percher can block only creatures with flying.
{1}{B}: Battlefield Percher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Battlefield Percher can block only creatures with flying.
{1}{B}: Battlefield Percher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Dark Triumph
mc.oracleText:
If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Dark Triumph's mana cost.

Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
If you control a swamp, you may sacrifice a creature instead of paying Dark Triumph's mana cost.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: All that's left is the coronation.

mc.name: Massacre
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Swamp, you may play Massacre without paying its mana cost.

All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent controls a plains and you control a swamp, you may play Massacre without paying its mana cost.
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Volrath the Fallen
mc.oracleText: {1}{B}, Discard a creature card: Volrath the Fallen gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: {1}{B}, Discard a creature card from your hand: Volrath the Fallen gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
mc.flavorText: "I stepped out. I did not step down."

mc.name: Murderous Betrayal
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}, Pay half your life rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: {B}{B}, Pay half your life rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: In darkness, the assassin sneaked into the village and destroyed what Eladamri loved most: his daughter.

mc.name: Death Pit Offering
mc.oracleText:
When Death Pit Offering comes into play, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
mc.printedText:
As Death Pit Offering comes into play, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
mc.flavorText:
"Kill them all and feed them to the new recruits."
--Crovax

mc.name: Mind Slash
mc.oracleText: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Play this ability only if you could play a sorcery.
mc.flavorText: "I can't think with all that screaming."

mc.name: Laccolith Grunt
mc.oracleText: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText: They leave a trail of ash and sorrow.

mc.name: Flowstone Crusher
mc.oracleText: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Someone must have done something very bad to make a rock that angry."
--Rebel scout

mc.name: Laccolith Whelp
mc.oracleText: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText: They don't feed; they stoke.

mc.name: Flowstone Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Flowstone Wall gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
{R}: Flowstone Wall gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The rebels assaulted the wall, never suspecting the wall would assault back.

mc.name: Downhill Charge
mc.oracleText:
You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Downhill Charge's mana cost.

Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.
mc.printedText:
You may sacrifice a mountain instead of paying Downhill Charge's mana cost.
Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of mountains you control.

mc.name: Laccolith Rig
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, the first creature deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, enchanted creature deals no combat damage this turn.

mc.name: Seal of Fire
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"I am the romancer, the passion that consumes the flesh."
--Seal inscription

mc.name: Flowstone Strike
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +1/-1 and gains haste until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +1/-1 and gains haste until end of turn. (It may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: Aggression exacts its toll.

mc.name: Arc Mage
mc.oracleText: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Arc Mage deals 2 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.printedText: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Arc Mage deals 2 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

mc.name: Laccolith Warrior
mc.oracleText: Whenever Laccolith Warrior becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Warrior deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Laccolith Warrior becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Warrior deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText: The screams are brief. The silence lingers.

mc.name: Mogg Alarm
mc.oracleText:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Mogg Alarm's mana cost.
Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText:
You may sacrifice two mountains instead of paying Mogg Alarm's mana cost.
Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
mc.flavorText: They make mountains into mogg holes.

mc.name: Rupture
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.
mc.flavorText: All creatures have an inner fire. Releasing it can be dangerous.

mc.name: Flowstone Surge
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +1/-1.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +1/-1.
mc.flavorText: The army was never at a loss for weapons; Crovax was their forge.

mc.name: Mogg Salvage
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Mountain, you may play Mogg Salvage without paying its mana cost.

Destroy target artifact.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent controls an island and you control a mountain, you may play Mogg Salvage without paying its mana cost.
Destroy target artifact.
mc.flavorText: Three moggs, one treasure, too bad.

mc.name: Moggcatcher
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Goblin permanent card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Goblin card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: "They're not worth much, but they're easy to catch."

mc.name: Flowstone Overseer
mc.oracleText: {R}{R}: Target creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}{R}: Target creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The rebels couldn't see where the roar was coming from. Then they saw it was coming from everywhere.

mc.name: Shrieking Mogg
mc.oracleText:
Haste
When Shrieking Mogg comes into play, tap all other creatures.
mc.printedText:
Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
When Shrieking Mogg comes into play, tap all other creatures.
mc.flavorText: You have to admire its enthusiasm.

mc.name: Flowstone Slide
mc.oracleText: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.
mc.printedText: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It may look like soil, but its nature is malice.

mc.name: Mana Cache
mc.oracleText:
At the end of each player's turn, put a charge counter on Mana Cache for each untapped land that player controls.

Remove a charge counter from Mana Cache: Add {1} to your mana pool. Any player may play this ability but only during his or her turn before the end phase.
mc.printedText:
At the end of each player's turn, put a charge counter on Mana Cache for each untapped land that player controls.
Remove a charge counter from Mana Cache: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. Any player may play this ability but only during his or her turn before the end phase.

mc.name: Stronghold Gambit
mc.oracleText: Each player chooses a card in his or her hand. Then each player reveals his or her chosen card. The owner of the creature card revealed this way with the lowest converted mana cost puts that card into play. If two or more creature cards are tied for lowest cost, those cards are put into play.
mc.printedText: Each player chooses a card in his or her hand. Then each player reveals his or her chosen card. The owner of the creature card revealed this way with the lowest converted mana cost puts that card into play. If two or more creature cards are tied for lowest cost, those cards are put into play.

mc.name: Stampede Driver
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

mc.name: Skyshroud Ridgeback
mc.oracleText: Fading 2 (This creature comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
mc.printedText: Fading 2 (This creature comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

mc.name: Skyshroud Sentinel
mc.oracleText: When Skyshroud Sentinel comes into play, you may search your library for up to three cards named Skyshroud Sentinel, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Skyshroud Sentinel comes into play, you may search your library for up to three Skyshroud Sentinel cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Blastoderm
mc.oracleText:
Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
mc.printedText:
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Blastoderm can't be the target of spells or abilities.

mc.name: Coiling Woodworm
mc.oracleText: Coiling Woodworm's power is equal to the number of Forests in play.
mc.printedText: Coiling Woodworm's power is equal to the number of forests in play.
mc.flavorText: Only the elves know where the woods end and the woodworm begins.

mc.name: Treetop Bracers
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can be blocked only by creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

mc.name: Seal of Strength
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"I am the feeder, the morsel that revives the starving."
--Seal inscription

mc.name: Fog Patch
mc.oracleText:
Play Fog Patch only during the declare blockers step.

Attacking creatures become blocked. (This spell works on unblockable creatures.)
mc.printedText:
Play Fog Patch only during the declare blockers step.
Attacking creatures become blocked. (This spell works on unblockable creatures.)
mc.flavorText: Realizing they weren't getting past the fog, the elves did the only thing they could do: wait.

mc.name: Harvest Mage
mc.oracleText: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, if you tap a land for mana, it produces one mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type and amount.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Until end of turn, if you tap a land for mana, it produces one mana of any color instead of its normal type and amount.
mc.flavorText: "Why should one limit oneself to the resources at hand?"

mc.name: Skyshroud Cutter
mc.oracleText: If you control a Forest, you may have each other player gain 5 life rather than pay Skyshroud Cutter's mana cost.
mc.printedText: If you control a forest, you may have each other player gain 5 life instead of paying Skyshroud Cutter's mana cost.

mc.name: Nesting Wurm
mc.oracleText:
Trample
When Nesting Wurm comes into play, you may search your library for up to three cards named Nesting Wurm, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Trample
When Nesting Wurm comes into play, you may search your library for up to three Nesting Wurm cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Woodripper
mc.oracleText:
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

{1}, Remove a fade counter from Woodripper: Destroy target artifact.
mc.printedText:
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
{1}, Remove a fade counter from Woodripper: Destroy target artifact.

mc.name: Pack Hunt
mc.oracleText: Search your library for up to three cards with the same name as target creature, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for up to three copies of target creature, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The one you see is just a diversion.

mc.name: Wild Mammoth
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more creatures than any other, that player gains control of Wild Mammoth.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more creatures than any other, that player gains control of Wild Mammoth.
mc.flavorText: "Sit. Heel Down HELP"

mc.name: Animate Land
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, target land is a 3/3 creature that's still a land.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, target land is a 3/3 creature that's still a land.
mc.flavorText: Irony is getting walked on by the earth instead of the other way around.

mc.name: Refreshing Rain
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls a Swamp and you control a Forest, you may play Refreshing Rain without paying its mana cost.

Target player gains 6 life.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent controls a swamp and you control a forest, you may play Refreshing Rain without paying its mana cost.
Target player gains 6 life.

mc.name: Skyshroud Poacher
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Search your library for an Elf permanent card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Search your library for an Elf card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: "It's OK. They're just elves."

mc.name: Saproling Burst
mc.oracleText:
Fading 7 (This enchantment comes into play with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Put a green Saproling creature token into play. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst."

When Saproling Burst leaves play, destroy all tokens put into play with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText:
Fading 7
Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Put a green Saproling creature token into play. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst."
When Saproling Burst leaves play, destroy all tokens put into play with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Saproling Cluster
mc.oracleText: {1}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText: {1}, Discard a card from your hand: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play. Any player may play this ability.

mc.name: Rejuvenation Chamber
mc.oracleText:
Fading 2 (This artifact comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

{T}: You gain 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Fading 2 (This artifact comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
{T}: You gain 2 life.

mc.name: Rusting Golem
mc.oracleText:
Fading 5 (This creature comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Rusting Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Fading 5 (This creature comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Rusting Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on it.

mc.name: Belbe's Armor
mc.oracleText: {X}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {X}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It protects her from the ravages of Phyrexia and the savages of Rath.

mc.name: Flowstone Armor
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Flowstone Armor during your untap step.

{3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/-1 as long as Flowstone Armor remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Flowstone Armor during your untap step.
{3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/-1 as long as Flowstone Armor remains tapped.

mc.name: Eye of Yawgmoth
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Put one into your hand and remove the rest from the game.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Put one into your hand and remove the rest from the game.

mc.name: Terrain Generator
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand into play tapped.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Put a basic land card from your hand into play tapped.

mc.name: Complex Automaton
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more permanents, return Complex Automaton to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more permanents, return Complex Automaton to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"This wasteful design cannot possibly be Phyrexian."
--Belbe

mc.name: Rackling
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Rackling deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Rackling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand fewer than three.
mc.flavorText: "This may hurt a little."

mc.name: Viseling
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Viseling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Viseling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus four.
mc.flavorText: "This may hurt a lot."

mc.name: Flowstone Thopter
mc.oracleText: {1}: Flowstone Thopter gets +1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}: Flowstone Thopter gets +1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Airborne flowstone isn't less dangerous, only less common.

mc.name: Tangle Wire
mc.oracleText:
Fading 4 (This artifact comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.
mc.printedText:
Fading 4 (This artifact comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

mc.name: Predator, Flagship
mc.oracleText:
{2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

{5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.
mc.printedText:
{2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"The scourge of Skyshroud is airborne once more."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Belbe's Portal
mc.oracleText:
As Belbe's Portal comes into play, choose a creature type.
{3}, {T}: You may put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand into play.
mc.printedText:
As Belbe's Portal comes into play, choose a creature type.
{3}, {T}: Put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand into play.
mc.flavorText: The fight will continue on a new battlefield.

mc.name: Rath's Edge
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Kor Haven
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

Fading 4 (This creature comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

Fading 4 (This creature comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

mc.name: Netter en-Dal
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't attack this turn.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Target creature can't attack this turn.
mc.flavorText: The wizard's vocabulary of mogg profanities increased with every net she cast.

mc.name: Parallax Wave
mc.oracleText:
Fading 5 (This enchantment comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

Remove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Remove target creature from the game if Parallax Wave is in play.

When Parallax Wave leaves play, each player returns to play all cards other than Parallax Wave he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Wave.
mc.printedText:
Fading 5
Remove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Remove target creature from the game.
When Parallax Wave leaves play, each player returns to play all cards he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Wave.

mc.name: Phyrexian Prowler
mc.oracleText:
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Phyrexian Prowler: Phyrexian Prowler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Phyrexian Prowler: Phyrexian Prowler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Oracle's Attendants
mc.oracleText: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.
mc.printedText: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.
mc.flavorText: The future isn't sacred, but its speaker is.

mc.name: Parallax Nexus
mc.oracleText:
Fading 5 (This enchantment comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

Remove a fade counter from Parallax Nexus: Target opponent removes a card in his or her hand from the game if Parallax Nexus is in play. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

When Parallax Nexus leaves play, each player returns to his or her hand all cards he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Nexus.
mc.printedText:
Fading 5
Remove a fade counter from Parallax Nexus: Target opponent removes a card in his or her hand from the game. Play this ability only if you could play a sorcery.
When Parallax Nexus leaves play, each player returns to his or her hand all cards he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Nexus.

mc.name: Off Balance
mc.oracleText: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
mc.flavorText: A heavy weapon deals plenty of damage--but it does have to hit.

mc.name: Stronghold Machinist
mc.oracleText: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target noncreature spell.
mc.printedText: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Counter target noncreature spell.
mc.flavorText: She stretches the laws of physics until they snap.

mc.name: Parallax Tide
mc.oracleText:
Fading 5 (This enchantment comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

Remove a fade counter from Parallax Tide: Remove target land from the game if Parallax Tide is in play.

When Parallax Tide leaves play, each player returns to play all cards he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Tide.
mc.printedText:
Fading 5
Remove a fade counter from Parallax Tide: Remove target land from the game.
When Parallax Tide leaves play, each player returns to play all cards he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Tide.

mc.name: Bola Warrior
mc.oracleText: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't block this turn.
mc.printedText: {R}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Target creature can't block this turn.
mc.flavorText: The ingredients for panic include equal parts danger, uncertainty, and helplessness.

mc.name: Overlaid Terrain
mc.oracleText:
As Overlaid Terrain comes into play, sacrifice all lands you control.

Lands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."
mc.printedText:
As Overlaid Terrain comes into play, sacrifice all lands you control.
Lands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."
mc.flavorText: One must reap before one can sow.

mc.name: Flint Golem
mc.oracleText: Whenever Flint Golem becomes blocked, defending player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Whenever Flint Golem becomes blocked, defending player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Æther Barrier
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a creature spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a creature spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.
mc.flavorText:
"Creatures fade in and out of existence. It's an unfortunate side effect. The losses are tolerable."
--Belbe

mc.name: Flame Rift
mc.oracleText: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
mc.printedText: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
mc.flavorText: Crovax hungered for power, and the stronghold devoured the sky.

mc.name: Rootwater Commando
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.)
mc.printedText: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an island.)
mc.flavorText: Rootwater merfolk are seldom seen these days, but elf corpses are as numerous as ever.

mc.name: Oraxid
mc.oracleText: Protection from red
mc.printedText: Protection from red
mc.flavorText:
"I'm constantly amazed by the tenacity of living creatures on this plane. Even in the stronghold's white-hot core, life persists."
--Ertai

mc.name: Ancient Hydra
mc.oracleText:
Fading 5 (This creature comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

{1}, Remove a fade counter from Ancient Hydra: Ancient Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Fading 5 (This creature comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
{1}, Remove a fade counter from Ancient Hydra: Ancient Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Laccolith Titan
mc.oracleText: Whenever Laccolith Titan becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Titan deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Laccolith Titan becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Titan deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText: Proximity guarantees injury or death.

mc.name: Mogg Toady
mc.oracleText:
Mogg Toady can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Mogg Toady can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
mc.printedText:
Mogg Toady can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Mogg Toady can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

mc.name: Parallax Inhibitor
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Parallax Inhibitor: Put a fade counter on each permanent with fading you control.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Parallax Inhibitor: Put a fade counter on each permanent with fading you control.
mc.flavorText:
"The best I can offer is a temporary reprieve."
--Belbe

mc.name: Sivvi's Valor
mc.oracleText:
If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay the mana cost of Sivvi's Valor.

All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to you instead.
mc.printedText:
If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying the mana cost of Sivvi's Valor.
All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to you instead.

mc.name: Reverent Silence
mc.oracleText:
If you control a Forest, you may have each other player gain 6 life rather than pay Reverent Silence's mana cost.

Destroy all enchantments.
mc.printedText:
If you control a forest, you may have each other player gain 6 life instead of paying Reverent Silence's mana cost.
Destroy all enchantments.

mc.name: Kill Switch
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Tap all other artifacts. They don't untap during their controllers' untap steps as long as Kill Switch remains tapped.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Tap all other artifacts. They don't untap during their controllers' untap steps as long as Kill Switch remains tapped.
mc.flavorText: Success is largely a matter of knowing which lever to pull.

mc.name: Silkenfist Fighter
mc.oracleText: Whenever Silkenfist Fighter becomes blocked, untap it.
mc.printedText: Whenever Silkenfist Fighter becomes blocked, untap it.
mc.flavorText:
Simple wooden staff
Made from life, protecting life,
Stronger than cold steel.

mc.name: Silkenfist Order
mc.oracleText: Whenever Silkenfist Order becomes blocked, untap it.
mc.printedText: Whenever Silkenfist Order becomes blocked, untap it.
mc.flavorText:
Hands weave life and death;
Intertwining spirits knit
Tapestries and shrouds.

mc.name: Stronghold Discipline
mc.oracleText: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.
mc.printedText: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.
mc.flavorText:
"Crovax never passes up an opportunity to cause widespread misery."
--Belbe

mc.name: Air Bladder
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature has flying.
Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: Random mutations among Rootwater merfolk were common--and disturbing.

mc.name: Phyrexian Driver
mc.oracleText: When Phyrexian Driver comes into play, all other Mercenaries get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: When Phyrexian Driver comes into play, all other Mercenaries get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Although the abuse was initially effective, the troops soon became numb to it.

mc.name: Stronghold Zeppelin
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Stronghold Zeppelin can block only creatures with flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Stronghold Zeppelin can block only creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: As long as the stronghold controlled the sky, the rebels were doomed.

mc.name: Ensnare
mc.oracleText:
You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Ensnare's mana cost.

Tap all creatures.
mc.printedText:
You may return two islands you control to their owner's hand instead of paying Ensnare's mana cost.
Tap all creatures.
mc.flavorText: Rootwater has become as dangerous to its denizens as to its enemies.

mc.name: Rootwater Thief
mc.oracleText:
{U}: Rootwater Thief gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever Rootwater Thief deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, search that player's library for a card and remove that card from the game, then the player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText:
{U}: Rootwater Thief gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever Rootwater Thief deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, search that player's library for a card and remove that card from the game, then the player shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Rathi Assassin
mc.oracleText:
{1}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped nonblack creature.
{3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
{1}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped nonblack creature.
{3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Skyshroud Claim
mc.oracleText: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for up to two forest cards and put them into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

mc.name: Skyshroud Behemoth
mc.oracleText:
Fading 2 (This creature comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Skyshroud Behemoth comes into play tapped.

Fading 2 (This creature comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

mc.name: Ascendant Evincar
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Other black creatures get +1/+1.
Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Other black creatures get +1/+1.
Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.
mc.flavorText:
"Things are going to change around here."
--Crovax

mc.name: Rhox
mc.oracleText:
You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

You may have Rhox deal combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox.
